product_name: Marmot Dena Insulated Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Light and sleek, and equally at home on the trail or around town, the women's Marmot Dena Insulated Jacket delivers a terrific balance of warmth, durability and low weight. As a mid layer, the Dena delivers superior warmth and comfort; in cool shoulder-season weather, pair it with a base layer for all-day comfort. Tough ripstop-nylon shell fabric capably meets the challenges of the elements; Thermal R(R) Eco insulation is warm, lightweight and derived from recycled materials. Sleek-fitting hood enhances warmth under a shell hood or by itself in mild conditions. DriClime(R) lined chin guard feels soft against skin. Elastic drawcord hem and low-profile elastic-bound cuffs seal in warmth. Hand and chest pockets feature hidden zippers. Marmot Dena Insulated Jacket has a zip storage pocket on the interior of the jacket. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion and prevent jacket from riding up. Closeout.
short_description: Light and sleek, and equally at home on the trail or around town, the women's Marmot Dena Insulated Jacket delivers a terrific balance of warmth, durability and low weight.
